lead_paragraph: The German opera singer has withdrawn from the highly anticipated production of Wagner’s “Die Walküre” at La Scala in Milan and the Staatsoper unter den Linden in Berlin, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: The German opera singer has withdrawn from the highly anticipated production of Wagner’s “Die Walküre” at La Scala in Milan and the Staatsoper unter den Linden in Berlin, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: René Pape Withdraws From Next ‘Ring’ Installment
headline.print_headline: René Pape Withdraws From Next ‘Ring’ Installment
